line: / DIRECTORS’ REPORT
label: heading

line: PRINCIPAL ACTIVITIES
label: heading

line: The principal activity of the Bega Cheese Group in the course of the
label: paragraph

line: ﬁnancial year was receiving, processing, manufacturing and
label: paragraph

line: distributing dairy and associated products. A number of key events
label: paragraph

line: in relation to the activities of the Group during the year ended 30
label: paragraph

line: June 2016 are set out in the Executive Chairman’s review and the
label: paragraph

line: Chief Executive Ofﬁcer’s review of operations and activities, which is
label: paragraph

line: to be read in conjunction with this Directors’ report.
label: paragraph

line: DIVIDENDS
label: heading

line: The dividends paid to shareholders during the ﬁnancial year were:
label: paragraph

line: Interim ordinary dividend for the year
label: paragraph

line: ended 30 June 2016 of 4.5 cents
label: paragraph

line: Final ordinary dividend for the year
label: paragraph

line: ended 30 June 2015 of 4.5 cents
label: paragraph

line: Interim ordinary dividend for the year
label: paragraph

line: ended 30 June 2015 of 4.0 cents
label: paragraph

line: Final ordinary dividend for the year
label: paragraph

line: ended 30 June 2014 of 4.5 cents
label: paragraph

line: In addition to the above dividends, since the end of the ﬁnancial year
label: paragraph

line: the Directors have recommended payment of a ﬁnal ordinary
label: paragraph

line: dividend of $7,630,000 (5.0 cents per fully paid share) to be paid on
label: paragraph

line: 15 September 2016.
label: paragraph

line: REVIEW OF OPERATIONS
label: heading

line: A comprehensive review of operations is set out in the Chief
label: paragraph

line: Executive Ofﬁcer’s review of operations and activities.
label: paragraph

line: SIGNIFICANT CHANGES IN THE
label: heading

line: STATE OF AFFAIRS
label: heading

line: Other than that disclosed in the Executive Chairman’s review and the
label: paragraph

line: Chief Executive Ofﬁcer’s review of operations and activities, there
label: paragraph

line: have been no signiﬁcant changes in the state of affairs of Bega
label: paragraph

line: Cheese Group since the last Annual Report.
label: paragraph

line: INDEMNIFICATION AND
label: heading

line: INSURANCE PREMIUMS FOR
label: heading

line: OFFICERS
label: heading

line: During the ﬁnancial year, Bega Cheese Group paid a premium in
label: paragraph

line: respect of a contract insuring the Directors and all executive ofﬁcers
label: paragraph

line: of the Group and of any related body corporate against a liability
label: paragraph

line: incurred as such a Director or executive ofﬁcer, not exceeding the
label: paragraph

line: extent permitted by law. The contracts of insurance prohibit
label: paragraph

line: disclosure of the nature of the liabilities and the amount of the
label: paragraph

line: premiums. The Group has not otherwise, during or since the ﬁnancial
label: paragraph

line: year, except to the extent permitted by law, indemniﬁed or agreed to
label: paragraph

line: indemnify an ofﬁcer of the Group or any related body corporate
label: paragraph

line: against a liability incurred as such an ofﬁcer. This does not include
label: paragraph

line: remuneration or employment related beneﬁts, any sum payable
label: paragraph

line: pursuant to a ﬁnancial support direction or contribution notice issued
label: paragraph

line: in respect of any pension scheme, ﬁnes and pecuniary penalties for
label: paragraph

line: a deliberate or intentional act, nor amounts which are prohibited to
label: paragraph

line: be paid by law.
label: paragraph

line: 20 / BEGA CHEESE LIMITED 2016 / DIRECTORS’ REPORT
label: paragraph

line: Each Director has entered into a deed of access and indemnity with
label: paragraph

line: the Group which indemniﬁes them for losses incurred as a Director
label: paragraph

line: or ofﬁcer of Bega Cheese and places an obligation on Bega Cheese
label: paragraph

line: Group to maintain a current Directors’ and Ofﬁcers’ policy with a
label: paragraph

line: reputable insurer for the period of the Director’s tenure and for a
label: paragraph

line: seven year tail period (or longer if there is an unresolved outstanding
label: paragraph

line: claim against the Director) and a contractual right of the Director to
label: paragraph

line: access Group records for the period of the Director’s tenure and for
label: paragraph

line: a seven year tail period (or longer if there is an unresolved outstanding
label: paragraph

line: claim against the Director).
label: paragraph

line: The Company has also agreed to indemnify the Company Secretaries
label: paragraph

line: and certain senior executives for all liabilities to another person (other
label: paragraph

line: than the Company or a related body corporate) that may arise from
label: paragraph

line: their position, except where the liability arises out of conduct involving
label: paragraph

line: a lack of good faith. The agreement stipulates that the Company
label: paragraph

line: will meet the full amount of any such liabilities, including costs
label: paragraph

line: and expenses.
label: paragraph

line: RETIREMENT, ELECTION AND
label: heading

line: CONTINUATION IN OFFICE OF
label: heading

line: DIRECTORS
label: heading

line: In accordance with the Constitution, Max Roberts and Richard Platts
label: paragraph

line: are due to retire as Directors at the Annual General Meeting and,
label: paragraph

line: being eligible, offer themselves for re-election.
label: paragraph

line: COMPANY SECRETARIES
label: heading

line: The Company Secretary registered with the ASX is Brett Kelly FCA,
label: paragraph

line: GAICD. Brett Kelly was appointed to the position of Company
label: paragraph

line: Secretary in 2002. Brett Kelly holds a Bachelor of Commerce in
label: paragraph

line: Accounting and is a Chartered Accountant with 31 years’ experience.
label: paragraph

line: He has also been a graduate member of the Australian Institute of
label: paragraph

line: Company Directors since 2006. Brett Kelly completed the Certiﬁcate
label: paragraph

line: in Governance and Risk Management with the Governance Institute
label: paragraph

line: of Australia in December 2011.
label: paragraph

line: Colin Grifﬁn CA was appointed to the position of Company Secretary
label: paragraph

line: in 1993. Colin Grifﬁn holds a Bachelor of Arts in Accounting and is a
label: paragraph

line: Chartered Accountant with 33 years’ experience. Colin Grifﬁn’s
label: paragraph

line: primary responsibility is as Chief Financial Ofﬁcer (CFO).
label: paragraph
